snippet: "Joseph Anton: A Memoir," due out in September, borrows its name from the alias Salman Rushdie used when he was under death threat after the publication of "The Satanic Verses."
abstract: "Joseph Anton: A Memoir," due out in September, borrows its name from the alias Salman Rushdie used when he was under death threat after the publication of "The Satanic Verses."

headline.main: Rushdie's Memoir Title Pays Tribute to a Pair of Fellow Authors
headline.print_headline: Rushdie’s Memoir Has Alias for Title
